Somos una empresa ecuatoriana que diseña: We are an Ecuadorian company that designs and produces electronic equipment, software and online services.
Hablemos de tu proyecto atención 24/7: Let's talk about your project 24/7 attention
Utilizamos tecnologías, lenguajes de pro: We use high-performance technologies, programming languages ​​and frameworks to quickly and efficiently build the most innovative solutions for the world and our customers.
¡Hola! como podemos ayudarte?: Hello! how can we help you?
Diseño y fabricación de productos electr: Design and manufacture of electronic products
Somos especialistas en diseño y fabricac: We are specialists in the design and manufacture of electronic solutions for companies, from printed circuits to complete customized products, incorporating electronic and electromechanical elements, always providing an innovative, quality vision aimed at improving efficiency and results.
Desarrollamos software a medida. Abarcam: We develop custom software. We cover the entire process that goes from the prior consulting phase (strategic study of the project) to the evolutionary maintenance of the system through design and architecture, development, testing phase, quality control, commissioning and support. In other words, we carry out the complete cycle of a software development.
Los servicios en línea van de simples a: Online services range from simple to complex. A simple online service could be as basic as providing information to researchers. A complex online service could be an application to apply for financial aid online. Online services include email services, music or movie websites, search engines, or online stores.
Diseñar y desarrollar productos electrón: Design and develop electronic products, software and online services to provide access and availability to all people in the world.
Nuestra misión es lograr que la mayor ca: Our mission is to ensure that the largest number of people have access to technology and can implement it in their home or business.
Mejorar la calidad de vida de las person: Improve the quality of life of people, through technological innovation, to be recognized as the leading Ecuadorian company in technologies.
Nuestro equipo regresará a usted en cues: Our team will be back to you in a matter of hours to assist you.
Te da la bienvenida y gracias por escrib: You are welcomed and thank you for writing to us. We will answer as soon as possible.
